definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. in [[]]—[[ִ]] acc. to Ba:NB104);—oft. + Heshbon and other important towns, Nu 21:31 + v:Nu 21:24 (v. [[עַז]]) Nu 32:1 (´[[אֶרֶץ יַע]]), v:Nu 32:3; v:Nu 32:35 (all JE), 2Sa 24:5, Jos 13:25 (P), Jos 21:39 (Ginsb, v:37 van d. H. Baer; P); with vineyards Is 16:8, Is 16:9 = Je 48:32, Je 48:32 (where del. [[יׇם]] before ´[[יַע]] LXX Hi Gf Gie Rothst). Site dub, cf. Buhl:Geogr. 264.
